info.title: Xano Metadata API - MCP SERVER
info.description: The Metadata API provides support to programatically manage your Xano instance and uses Access Tokens to control access.

get.summary: Documentation endpoint that provides a comprehensive overview of the MCP Server's operation and includes detailed documentation for the XanoScript syntax. Use the type "start" to view all available commands.
get.description:
Documentation endpoint that provides a comprehensive overview of the MCP Server's operation and includes detailed documentation for the XanoScript syntax. Use the type "start" to view all available commands.

Authentication: required

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.
